content: Those exercises and advice sound really helpful. I think I'll start by reflecting on my values and identifying my strengths. I've been feeling a bit stuck in my current job, so it's good to take a step back and think about what I want to achieve in my career. By the way, my hairdresser told me that it's normal for people in their early thirties to start experiencing some graying, but it still made me feel a bit self-conscious.
